statements: UPDATE supply_chain_info SET quantity = 20 WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND product_id = 201

UPDATE supply_chain_relationships SET severity_score = 0.9, relationship_type = 'Supplier' WHERE parent_node_id = 2 AND child_node_id = 3;

UPDATE supply_chain_relationships SET severity_score = 6.5, relationship_type = 'Supplier' WHERE parent_node_id = 1 AND child_node_id = 2;
